data.actual_result: The text is moving up/down and getting blocked by other text.
data.expected_result: The text should go up and down normally.
data.short_description: Text moves strangely when linking xbox live account.
data.steps_to_repro: - User settings - Connections - Add new connection - Select Xbox live - When the keyboard is up, press return - Observe the “Enter the code...” text.
